requirements.main: Experience in building blockchain projects in Solidity, go or Rust.
Will help lead research and development of a new blockchain protocol. Platforms in considerations:
Subgraph development experience is a nice to have.
Experience in go, rust, javascript, python considered.
High interest and conviction to join the blockchain industry, even if they have no prior blockchain experience. This could be their first blockchain job!
Can quickly pick up new coding tasks.
